author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kimura to offer off-floor distribution of shares
text:
Feb 19 (Reuters) - Kimura Co Ltd
* Says it will offer an off-floor distribution of 100,000 shares on Tokyo Stock Exchange between March 7 and March 13
* Offering price will be determined based on the closing share price of the day before the distribution
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 2,000 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/2ZFdDr
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
